Save Critical Bandwidth, Speed, and Data on Shared Internet Connections

The Manage My Internet app addresses the often overlooked problem of your machine trying to download and apply updates while on a shared internet connection, such as tethering to your cellphone. On such connections, updates from Windows and your software applications can take up your already limited bandwidth and data. You may experience slower than normal connection speeds in these scenarios or, if tethered to a phone, you may even exceed your data plan. Once enabled, the Manage My Internet app sees if you are on a shared internet connection where bandwidth and data is at premium. It will then disable updates until such time that your machine connects to a normal WIFI or network connection.

The Manage My Internet app is truly a set-it-and-forget it process. By turning the app on, you will save your limited bandwidth. Additionally, your Windows and software updates will proceed as normal as soon as you connect to a network that can handle them.

Why Manage My Internet is Valuable

Many regularly use a shared internet connection as part of their technology experience. If you're traveling, using your phone and its data plan as a WIFI hub is a great convenience. Similarly, limited internet connections are the norm in environments such as on a cruise ship or while flying. These connections allow to continue to work productively and remain on the internet even in the most remote of locations.

At the same time, however, these connections are extremely limited in terms of the bandwidth they offer. If tethered to a phone, you even have to be concious not to exceed your phone's data plan. Updates, be it from Microsoft or another software provider, largely do not distinguish between what type of connection you are currently experiencing. Consequently, these updates will attempt to download and apply themselves regardless if you have the bandwidth or data to support it.

The Manage My Internet app changes all that. With the app turned on, you can be assured that updates won't take up your data or bandwidth on a shared internet connection. This can save you crucial internet speeds and even prevent unforseen data overages. The best part is that once connected to a normal WIFI or network connection your updates will continue as normal.

Virus Protection Updates are Left Unchanged

While the app disables most updates while on a shared internet connection, it specifically leaves your Virus and Malware protection unchanged. This ensures that your virus and malware definitions can be continually updated and keep your protected.
